In this example I am going to make a clock example using golang


package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"time"
	tm "github.com/buger/goterm"
)

const digitH = 5

type placeholder [digitH]string
type clockDigits [10]placeholder

var digits = clockDigits{
	{
		"███",
		"█ █",
		"█ █",
		"█ █",
		"███",
	},
	{
		"██ ",
		" █ ",
		" █ ",
		" █ ",
		"███",
	},
	{
		"███",
		"  █",
		"███",
		"█  ",
		"███",
	},
	{
		"███",
		"  █",
		"███",
		"  █",
		"███",
	},
	{
		"█ █",
		"█ █",
		"███",
		"  █",
		"  █",
	},
	{
		"███",
		"█  ",
		"███",
		"  █",
		"███",
	},
	{
		"███",
		"█  ",
		"███",
		"█ █",
		"███",
	},
	{
		"███",
		"  █",
		"  █",
		"  █",
		"  █",
	},
	{
		"███",
		"█ █",
		"███",
		"█ █",
		"███",
	},
	{
		"███",
		"█ █",
		"███",
		"  █",
		"███",
	}}

var spacer = [2]placeholder{
	{
		"   ",
		"███",
		"   ",
		"███",
		"   ",
	}, {
		"   ",
		"   ",
		"   ",
		"   ",
		"   ",
	},
}

func printTime(hour int, min int, second int, sp bool) {
	h1 := int(hour/10)
	h2 := hour%10
	m1 := int(min/10)
	m2 := min%10
	s1 := int(second/10)
	s2 := second%10
	spaceIndex := 0
	if(sp) {spaceIndex = 1}

	for line := 0; line < digitH; line++ {
		// Print a line for each placeholder in digits
		fmt.Print(digits[h1][line], "  ")
		fmt.Print(digits[h2][line], "  ")

		fmt.Print(spacer[spaceIndex][line], "  ")

		fmt.Print(digits[m1][line], "  ")
		fmt.Print(digits[m2][line], "  ")

		fmt.Print(spacer[spaceIndex][line], "  ")

		fmt.Print(digits[s1][line], "  ")
		fmt.Print(digits[s2][line], "  ")

		fmt.Println()
	}
}

func main() {
	tm.Clear()
	sp := true
	for{
		t := time.Now()
		tm.MoveCursor(1, 1)
		fmt.Println()
		printTime(t.Hour(), t.Minute(), t.Second(),sp)
		tm.Flush() // Call it every time at the end of rendering
		sp = !sp
		time.Sleep(time.Second/2)
	}
}
title: Golang terminal clock example
